title: How to Respond When Someone Calls You an Angel

steps.title: This person might have feelings for you.
steps.content: This person might have feelings for you. Angels are also associated with angelic beauty. If your crush or someone you're dating calls you an angel, they likely find you beautiful and good-natured. A potential match might also use the compliment to flirt with you. "You're an angel. How did I get so lucky?" "You're so beautiful. You're like an angel. 😍"

steps.title: This person appreciates you and is giving you a compliment.
steps.content: This person appreciates you and is giving you a compliment. Angels are associated with kindness, generosity, and goodwill. When someone calls you an angel, it's usually because you display these qualities. You might receive a compliment like this if you've helped someone out or given them a generous gift. "Thank you so much for your help. You're an angel!" "What an amazing treat. You angel!"

steps.title: "Aw, you’re so sweet."
steps.content: "Aw, you’re so sweet." If your crush or a partner called you an angel, return the favor by praising their kindness. This response will also work well if you're not quite sure of their feelings for you just yet. "You're so kind. 😊"

steps.title: "You're too kind 😇."
steps.content: "You're too kind 😇." This message makes you appear confident and cute. If you received this compliment over text, adding the angel emoji will give your message a flirtatious touch. For a more mischievous response with a similar effect, you might try "Who, me? 😈"

steps.title: "You’re making me blush."
steps.content: "You’re making me blush." If you're excited that this person is flirting with you, whether they're a crush or someone you're dating, try a flirtier response. They'll like knowing their compliment made you blush, and you'll appear both humble and flattered. If you're texting, add a blushing smiley face emoji (😊) to make your text a little more playful.

steps.title: "You’re pretty angelic yourself."
steps.content: "You’re pretty angelic yourself." If you've got feelings for this person, try giving them a compliment in return. This response is a fun way to praise them without giving all of your feelings away. "I think you're pretty cool, too."

steps.title: "Thanks—what are you up to today?"
steps.content: "Thanks—what are you up to today?" It's possible that you're not exactly thrilled this person is flirting with you. If you've just been called an angel by someone on a dating app or a potential match (that you're not interested in), try changing the subject. It'll gently let them down and they'll hopefully get the hint. "Oh thank you. How have you been?"

steps.title: "Thank you!"
steps.content: "Thank you!" Getting called an angel by a friend feels pretty good, too. If you're flattered by the compliment, let this person know that you're thankful. [1] X Research source "Wow, thanks so much!”

steps.title: "I really appreciate that."
steps.content: "I really appreciate that." It takes courage to pay someone a compliment. If you were happy to get such a nice compliment from a buddy, let them know that you're grateful for their words. It'll surely make them smile. [2] X Research source "I'm so thankful for your kind words."

steps.title: "This totally made my day!"
steps.content: "This totally made my day!" If you're really touched by this person's compliment, let them know that it was the highlight of your day. This is a surefire way to make them know that you appreciated their words. "You just made my day so much better."
